headline: Did Credo Technology Group Holding's (CRDO) Legal Settlement With Amphenol Unlock New Growth in High-Speed Connectivity?
summary: Earlier this month, Credo Technology Group Holding Ltd. and Amphenol reached a comprehensive settlement agreement, resolving all pending patent litigation concerning active electrical cable technology between the two companies. This legal resolution eliminates a significant overhang, allowing Credo to focus more closely on growth opportunities in high-speed connectivity for AI and data centers worldwide. We'll now consider how clearing legal distractions could support Credo's efforts to...

headline: Amphenol (APH) Expands Defense, AI Reach With $1 Billion Trexon Deal
summary: Amphenol Corporation (NYSE:APH) is one of the best stocks to invest in for long-term growth. On August 18, electronic equipment giant Amphenol Corporation (NYSE:APH) said it will buy cable assembly firm Trexon for about $1 billion in cash. The acquisition will help the company get exposure to the rising defense spending and expand its military […]
